deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit tokens into yield source for a specific deal

getAccruedYield(uint256).notice: View current yield accrued for a deal

getPrincipal(uint256).notice: View the principal deposited for a deal

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw full balance (principal + yield) for a deal
